tool.name: Dendrogram
tool.help:
This tool generates a dendrogram from .Rdata file get in Process Otu tool.\
.. class:: infomark
**What is a dendrogram?**\
Also known as *tree diagram*, it is a diagram that shows hierarchical relationships between differents components or objects. To interprete a dendrogram is precise to analyse height between all components. Components that have same height are similar between them. Nevertheless, components with different height have got more different between them.\
**Dendrogram tool**\
It represents hierarchical relationships between different samples that user introduce in IonTorrent. Also, different samples appears whit different colour: black, red and green. Red colour is for samples with I condition, black is for samples with H condition and green is for samples with J condition.\
**Example**\
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/iontorrent/dendrogram.png :height: 900 :width: 900
**References**\
S. (2021, 23 noviembre). Hierarchical Clustering / Dendrogram: Simple Definition, Examples. Statistics How To. https://www.statisticshowto.com/hierarchical-clustering/
